transactionSet.name: Ship Notice/Manifest
transactionSet.description: This Draft Standard for Trial Use contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Ship Notice/Manifest Transaction Set (856) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. The transaction set can be used to list the contents of a shipment of goods as well as additional information relating to the shipment, such as order information, product description, physical characteristics, type of packaging, marking, carrier information, and configuration of goods within the transportation equipment. The transaction set enables the sender to describe the contents and configuration of a shipment in various levels of detail and provides an ordered flexibility to convey information. The sender of this transaction is the organization responsible for detailing and communicating the contents of a shipment, or shipments, to one or more receivers of the transaction set. The receiver of this transaction set can be any organization having an interest in the contents of a shipment or information about the contents of a shipment.

segment.name: Transaction Set Header
segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Beginning Segment for Ship Notice
segment.description: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data relating to the transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

dataElement.name: Shipment Identification
dataElement.description: A unique control number assigned by the original shipper to identify a specific shipment

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Structure Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the hierarchical application structure of a transaction set that utilizes the HL segment to define the structure of the transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of transaction

dataElement.name: Status Reason Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the status reason

segment.name: Date/Time Reference
segment.description: To specify pertinent dates and times

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Time Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

dataElement.name: Date Time Period Format Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

segment.name: Hierarchical Level
segment.description: To identify dependencies among and the content of hierarchically related groups of data segments

dataElement.name: Hierarchical ID Number
dataElement.description: A unique number assigned by the sender to identify a particular data segment in a hierarchical structure

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Parent ID Number
dataElement.description: Identification number of the next higher hierarchical data segment that the data segment being described is subordinate to

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Level Code
dataElement.description: Code defining the characteristic of a level in a hierarchical structure

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Child Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating if there are hierarchical child data segments subordinate to the level being described

segment.name: Item Identification
segment.description: To specify basic item identification data

dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.description: Identifying number for a product or service

segment.name: Purchase Order Reference
segment.description: To provide reference to a specific purchase order

dataElement.name: Purchase Order Number
dataElement.description: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

dataElement.name: Release Number
dataElement.description: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

dataElement.name: Change Order Sequence Number
dataElement.description: Number assigned by the orderer identifying a specific change or revision to a previously transmitted transaction set

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Assigned Identification
dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.name: Contract Number
dataElement.description: Contract number

dataElement.name: Purchase Order Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of Purchase Order

segment.name: Item Physical Details
segment.description: To specify the physical qualities, packaging, weights, and dimensions relating to the item

dataElement.name: Pack
dataElement.description: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

dataElement.name: Size
dataElement.description: Size of supplier units in pack

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Packaging Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

dataElement.name: Weight Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code defining the type of weight

dataElement.name: Gross Weight per Pack
dataElement.description: Numeric value of gross weight per pack

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Gross Volume per Pack
dataElement.description: Numeric value of gross volume per pack

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Length
dataElement.description: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

dataElement.name: Width
dataElement.description: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

dataElement.name: Height
dataElement.description: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Inner Pack
dataElement.description: The number of eaches per inner container

dataElement.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

dataElement.name: Assigned Identification
dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.name: Assigned Identification
dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.name: Number
dataElement.description: A generic number

segment.name: Product/Item Description
segment.description: To describe a product or process in coded or free-form format

dataElement.name: Item Description Type
dataElement.description: Code indicating the format of a description

dataElement.name: Product/Process Characteristic Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the general class of a product or process characteristic

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Product Description Code
dataElement.description: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

dataElement.name: Source Subqualifier
dataElement.description: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

dataElement.name: Language Code
dataElement.description: Code designating the language used in text, from a standard code list maintained by the International Standards Organization (ISO 639)

segment.name: Measurements

dataElement.name: Measurement Reference ID Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the broad category to which a measurement applies

dataElement.name: Measurement Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific product or process characteristic to which a measurement applies

dataElement.name: Measurement Value
dataElement.description: The value of the measurement

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Exponent
dataElement.description: Power to which a unit is raised

dataElement.name: Multiplier
dataElement.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

dataElement.description: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range

dataElement.name: Range Maximum
dataElement.description: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range

dataElement.name: Measurement Significance Code
dataElement.description: Code used to benchmark, qualify or further define a measurement value

dataElement.name: Measurement Attribute Code
dataElement.description: Code used to express an attribute response when a numeric measurement value cannot be determined

dataElement.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

dataElement.name: Measurement Method or Device
dataElement.description: The method or device used to record the measurement

segment.name: Paperwork
segment.description: To identify the type or transmission or both of paperwork or supporting information

dataElement.name: Report Type Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

dataElement.name: Report Transmission Code
dataElement.description: Code defining timing, transmission method or format by which reports are to be sent

dataElement.name: Report Copies Needed
dataElement.description: The number of copies of a report that should be sent to the addressee

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Paperwork/Report Action Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying how the paperwork or report that is identified in the PWK segment relates to the transaction set or to identify the action that is required

dataElement.name: Request Category Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a type of request

segment.name: Marking, Packaging, Loading
segment.description: To describe marking, packaging, loading, and unloading requirements

dataElement.name: Item Description Type
dataElement.description: Code indicating the format of a description

dataElement.name: Packaging Characteristic Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the marking, packaging, loading and related characteristics being described

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Packaging Description Code
dataElement.description: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about the marking, packaging or loading and unloading of a product

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Unit Load Option Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying loading or unloading a shipment

segment.name: Carrier Details (Quantity and Weight)
segment.description: To specify the transportation details relative to commodity, weight, and quantity

dataElement.name: Packaging Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

dataElement.name: Lading Quantity
dataElement.description: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

dataElement.name: Commodity Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

dataElement.name: Commodity Code
dataElement.description: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

dataElement.name: Lading Description
dataElement.description: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

dataElement.name: Weight Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code defining the type of weight

dataElement.name: Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Volume
dataElement.description: Value of volumetric measure

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

segment.name: Carrier Details (Routing Sequence/Transit Time)
segment.description: To specify the carrier and sequence of routing and provide transit time information

dataElement.name: Routing Sequence Code
dataElement.description: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Transportation Method/Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

dataElement.name: Routing
dataElement.description: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

dataElement.name: Shipment/Order Status Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

dataElement.name: Transit Direction Code
dataElement.description: The point of origin and point of direction

dataElement.name: Transit Time Direction Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying the value of time used to measure the transit time

dataElement.name: Transit Time
dataElement.description: The numeric amount of transit time

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

segment.name: Carrier Details (Equipment)
segment.description: To specify transportation details relating to the equipment used by the carrier

dataElement.name: Equipment Description Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

dataElement.name: Equipment Initial
dataElement.description: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

dataElement.name: Equipment Number
dataElement.description: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

dataElement.name: Weight Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code defining the type of weight

dataElement.name: Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Ownership Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the relationship of equipment to carrier or ownership of equipment

dataElement.name: Seal Status Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating condition of door seal upon arrival

dataElement.name: Seal Number
dataElement.description: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

dataElement.name: Equipment Type
dataElement.description: Code identifying equipment type

segment.name: Carrier Details (Special Handling, or Hazardous Materials, or Both)
segment.description: To specify transportation special handling requirements, or hazardous materials information, or both

dataElement.name: Special Handling Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code which qualifies the Hazardous Material Class Code (209)

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Class Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the kind of hazard for a material

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

segment.name: Trailer Shipment Details
segment.description: To specify details of shipments on a trailer

dataElement.name: Assigned Identification
dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.name: Position
dataElement.description: Relative position of shipment in car, trailer, or container (mutually defined)

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

segment.name: Administrative Communications Contact
segment.description: To identify a person or office to whom administrative communications should be directed

dataElement.name: Contact Function Code

dataElement.name: Name

dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

segment.name: Hazardous Identification Information
segment.description: To specify the hazardous commodity identification reference number and quantity

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Lading Quantity
dataElement.description: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

dataElement.name: UN/NA Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the hazardous material identification number as required by Title 49 of the code of Federal Regulations; UN/NA stands for United Nations/North America

dataElement.name: Hazardous Materials Page
dataElement.description: The United Nations page number as required for the international transport of hazardous materials

dataElement.name: Commodity Code
dataElement.description: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Quantity
dataElement.description: Numeric value of quantity

dataElement.name: Compartment ID Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the compartment in a compartmentalized tank car

dataElement.name: Residue Indicator Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating that the material being described is that which remains in a packaging (including a tank car) after it has been unloaded

dataElement.name: Packing Group Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating degree of danger in terms of Roman number I, II or III

dataElement.name: Interim Hazardous Material Regulatory Number
dataElement.description: Identifies the current regulatory version number used for hazardous materials shipments

segment.name: Hazardous Classification Information
segment.description: To specify the hazardous notation and endorsement information

dataElement.name: Hazardous Classification
dataElement.description: The hazardous classification corresponding to the shipping name of the hazardous commodity

dataElement.name: Hazardous Class Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying hazardous class

dataElement.name: Hazardous Placard Notation
dataElement.description: The placard notation corresponding to the hazard class of the hazardous commodity

dataElement.name: Hazardous Endorsement
dataElement.description: The placard endorsement that is to be shown on the shipping papers for the hazardous commodity

dataElement.name: Reportable Quantity Code
dataElement.description: Code to identify presence of hazardous substance

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

segment.name: Hazardous Material Shipping Name
segment.description: To specify the hazardous material shipping name and additional descriptive requirements

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Shipping Name
dataElement.description: The proper shipping name of the hazardous commodity as specified by the Code of Federal Regulations, Title 49

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Shipping Name Qualifier
dataElement.description: Qualifier indicating the source (regulatory) of the proper shipping name

dataElement.name: N.O.S. Indicator Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the type of regulatory requirements that apply to a description; N.O.S. stands for Not Otherwise Specified

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

segment.name: Freeform Hazardous Material Information
segment.description: To uniquely identify the variable information required by government regulation covering the transportation of hazardous material shipments

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Shipment Information Qualifier
dataElement.description: Qualifier indicating the type of information being passed so that a receiver may format a description of hazardous commodity movements that meets regulatory requirements

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Shipment Information
dataElement.description: Specific information required by law for hazardous material shipments

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Shipment Information
dataElement.description: Specific information required by law for hazardous material shipments

dataElement.name: Hazard Zone Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the Department of Transportation assigned zone designating the Inhalation Toxicity Hazard Zone

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Quantity
dataElement.description: Numeric value of quantity

dataElement.description: Numeric value of quantity

segment.name: EPA Required Data
segment.description: To specify the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) information relating to shipments of hazardous material

dataElement.description: Waste stream number applicable to the movement of hazardous waste as determined by government regulations

dataElement.name: Waste Characteristics Code
dataElement.description: Waste characteristics as defined by regulatory requirements

dataElement.name: State or Province Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

segment.name: Canadian Dangerous Requirements
segment.description: To specify additional Transport Canada requirements covering transportation of dangerous goods in Canada

dataElement.name: Emergency Response Plan Number
dataElement.description: The identity number of a specific hazardous emergency response plan that is assigned by the Director General of Canada

dataElement.name: Communication Number

dataElement.name: Packing Group Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating degree of danger in terms of Roman number I, II or III

dataElement.name: Subsidiary Classification
dataElement.description: Code indicating the classification of dangerous goods, other than the primary classification, that is associated with a number or a set of numbers

dataElement.description: Code specifying the application or source of Marks and Numbers (87)

segment.name: Date/Time Reference
segment.description: To specify pertinent dates and times

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Time Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

dataElement.name: Date Time Period Format Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Description

dataElement.description: Code identifying the source of the transportation terms

dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

segment.name: Pallet Information
segment.description: To identify the type and physical attributes of the pallet, and, gross weight, gross volume, and height of the load and the pallet

dataElement.name: Pallet Type Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the type of pallet

dataElement.name: Pallet Tiers
dataElement.description: The number of layers per pallet

dataElement.name: Pallet Blocks
dataElement.description: The number of pieces (cartons) per layer on the pallet

dataElement.name: Pack
dataElement.description: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

dataElement.name: Unit Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight per unit

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Length
dataElement.description: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

dataElement.name: Width
dataElement.description: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

dataElement.name: Height
dataElement.description: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Gross Weight per Pack
dataElement.description: Numeric value of gross weight per pack

dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Gross Volume per Pack

dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Pallet Exchange Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying pallet exchange instructions

dataElement.name: Inner Pack
dataElement.description: The number of eaches per inner container

segment.name: Currency

loop.name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Information

segment.name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Information
segment.description: To request or identify a service, promotion, allowance, or charge; to specify the amount or percentage for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

dataElement.name: Allowance or Charge Indicator
dataElement.description: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

dataElement.name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Agency Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Code
dataElement.description: Agency maintained code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

dataElement.name: Amount
dataElement.description: Monetary amount

dataElement.name: Allowance/Charge Percent Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating on what basis allowance or charge percent is calculated

dataElement.name: Percent
dataElement.description: Percent expressed as a percent

dataElement.name: Rate
dataElement.description: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Quantity
dataElement.description: Numeric value of quantity

dataElement.description: A unique number identifying available promotion or allowance options when more than one is offered

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Language Code
dataElement.description: Code designating the language used in text, from a standard code list maintained by the International Standards Organization (ISO 639)

segment.name: Currency
segment.description: To specify the currency (dollars, pounds, francs, etc.) used in a transaction

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Currency Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

dataElement.name: Exchange Rate
dataElement.description: Value to be used as a multiplier conversion factor to convert monetary value from one currency to another

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Currency Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

dataElement.name: Currency Market/Exchange Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the market upon which the currency exchange rate is based

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

segment.name: Furnished Goods and Services
segment.description: To specify information related to furnished material, equipment, property, information, and services

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Contract Number
dataElement.description: Contract number

dataElement.name: Monetary Amount
dataElement.description: Monetary amount

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Release Number
dataElement.description: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

segment.name: Yes/No Question
segment.description: To identify and answer yes and no questions, including the date, time, and comments further qualifying the condition

dataElement.name: Condition Indicator
dataElement.description: Code indicating a condition

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

dataElement.name: Date Time Period Format Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

dataElement.name: Free-Form Message Text
dataElement.description: Free-form message text

dataElement.name: Free-Form Message Text
dataElement.description: Free-form message text

dataElement.name: Free-Form Message Text
dataElement.description: Free-form message text

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Free-Form Message Text
dataElement.description: Free-form message text

segment.name: Code Source Information
segment.description: To transmit standard code list identification information

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Source Subqualifier
dataElement.description: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

segment.name: Industry Code
segment.description: Code to transmit standard industry codes

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

segment.name: Vessel Identification
segment.description: To provide vessel details and voyage number

dataElement.name: Vessel Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying vessel

dataElement.name: Vessel Name
dataElement.description: Name of ship as documented in "Lloyd's Register of Ships"

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

dataElement.name: Flight/Voyage Number
dataElement.description: Identifying designator for the particular flight or voyage on which the cargo travels

dataElement.name: Standard Carrier Alpha Code
dataElement.description: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

dataElement.name: Vessel Requirement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying options for satisfying vessel requirements

dataElement.name: Vessel Type Code
dataElement.description: Code to determine type of vessel

dataElement.name: Vessel Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying vessel code source

dataElement.name: Transportation Method/Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

segment.name: Port or Terminal
segment.description: Contractual or operational port or point relevant to the movement of the cargo

dataElement.name: Port or Terminal Function Code
dataElement.description: Code defining function performed at the port or terminal with respect to a shipment

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

dataElement.name: Port Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name for the place at which an offshore carrier originates or terminates (by transshipment or otherwise) its actual ocean carriage of property

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

dataElement.name: Terminal Name
dataElement.description: Free-form field for terminal name

dataElement.name: Pier Number
dataElement.description: Identifying number for the pier

dataElement.name: State or Province Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

segment.name: Date/Time Reference
segment.description: To specify pertinent dates and times

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Time Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

dataElement.name: Date Time Period Format Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

segment.name: Transaction Totals
segment.description: To transmit a hash total for a specific element in the transaction set

dataElement.name: Number of Line Items
dataElement.description: Total number of line items in the transaction set

dataElement.name: Hash Total
dataElement.description: Sum of values of the specified data element. All values in the data element will be summed without regard to decimal points (explicit or implicit) or signs. Truncation will occur on the left most digits if the sum is greater than the maximum size of the hash total of the data element. Example: -.0018 First occurrence of value being hashed. .18 Second occurrence of value being hashed. 1.8 Third occurrence of value being hashed. 18.01 Fourth occurrence of value being hashed. --------- 1855 Hash total prior to truncation. 855 Hash total after truncation to three-digit field.

dataElement.name: Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Volume
dataElement.description: Value of volumetric measure

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

segment.name: Transaction Set Trailer
segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

dataElement.name: Number of Included Segments
dataElement.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
